description: Detect suspicious ldap request from non Windows application
false_positives: Programs that also lookup the observed domain
name: Suspicious Ldap Domain Access
query: (dns.question.name:_ldap.* AND (NOT ((process.executable.text:C\:\\Windows\\*) OR (process.executable.text:C\:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\Platform\\* AND process.executable.text:*\\MsMpEng.exe) OR (process.executable.text:"<unknown\ process>"))))
author: frack113
